# The Agreeing Internet

## Description
Internet art piece that transforms disagreement into agreement, saying "yes" to the internet.

## Creators
- ax710 (https://www.ax710.org/)
- y-a-v-a (https://www.y-a-v-a.org/)

## Date
2009

## License
Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Netherlands
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/nl/

## Based On
"The Disagreeing Internet" by Constant Dullaart
https://www.thedisagreeinginternet.com/

## Attribution Required
When referencing this work, please credit ax710 & y-a-v-a and include the Creative Commons license.
